code: /** Admin actions */import{AdminService}from"../services/admin";import AdminConstants from"../constants/admin";import AlertActions from"./alert";export var get_all_courses=function get_all_courses(){return function(dispatch){AdminService.get_all_courses().then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:AdminConstants.GET_ALL_COURSES,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var post_new_course=function post_new_course(data){return function(dispatch){AdminService.post_new_course(data).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:AdminConstants.ADD_NEW_COURSE,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var delete_course=function delete_course(course_id){return function(dispatch){AdminService.delete_course(course_id).then(function(response){dispatch(AlertActions.success("Success"));dispatch({type:AdminConstants.DELETE_COURSE,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);dispatch(AlertActions.error(error));});};};export var update_course_material=function update_course_material(course_id,topic_id,data){return
